story_ch0064_00_rival_01_01000/2401_1201: Are you thinking about competing, too?

Hey! Why don’t you join our team, Paulo? You
seem pretty cool. I bet you’d be an
awesome teammate!

No, thanks... I think I’ll pass. I’m actually thinking
of putting together my own team to enter
the tournament.

You supported [Name:PlayerNickname ] in the
face of fearsome opponents and didn’t back
down. You’ve earned this badge.
Thank you...

I’m going to grow stronger...stronger than
anyone else...
Argh! What gives? Why can’t I win...

Now, now. No use crying over spilled milk.
You have some real strength! I can feel it in
my bones.

Hmm... I think you just need to believe in yourself
more. With a bit of confidence, you could
be great.

Your Rockruff was no match for our
powerful Pokémon.

Weaklings like you should shut your mouths and
let us do what we want!

Don’t make me laugh! There’s no way I’ll let
anyone steal Pokémon away from their Trainers!

I don’t care who it is. I’ll stop anyone who’d do
something so terrible!

My ideal team... I thought that I’d grown so much
stronger...
And I still lost?
...I just don’t understand.

What is it going to take to become stronger than
I am now? How do I beat [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]?

Ladies and gentlemen, I present to you the first
ever champions of the Pokémon Masters League!
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team!
Am I...
Am I just aiming too high?
